name: Datasets for hydrography.org tile code h12v02
description: Datasets for hydrography.org tile code h12v02
citation: Amatulli, G., Garcia Marquez, J., Sethi, T., Kiesel, J., Grigoropoulou, A., Üblacker, M. M., Shen, L. Q., and Domisch, S.: Hydrography90m: a new high-resolution global hydrographic dataset, Earth Syst. Sci. Data, 14, 4525–4550, https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-14-4525-2022, 2022.

variableMeasured.name: sample_id
variableMeasured.description: sample identification: WBC=whole body clearance expt.; WBF=whole body fluorescence on collection

variableMeasured.name: time_sample
variableMeasured.description: Number of minutes between collection and sampling for pigment content; decline of pigment content with time was used to calculate time to clear the gut of pigment.

variableMeasured.name: stage_id
variableMeasured.description: stage development index of larvae in sample (furcilia = F1-6 = 1-6,  juvenile = J=7)

variableMeasured.name: lat
variableMeasured.description: latitude, in decimal degrees, North is positive, negative denotes South

variableMeasured.name: lon
variableMeasured.description: longitude, in decimal degrees, East is positive, negative denotes West

variableMeasured.name: time_local
variableMeasured.description: time of day, local time, using 2400 clock format

variableMeasured.name: yrday_local
variableMeasured.description: local day and decimal time, as 326.5 for the 326th day of the year, or November 22 at 1200 hours (noon)

funding.name: GLOBEC: Winter Ecology of Larval Krill: Quantifying their Interaction with the Pack Ice Habitat
